nodes.bodyText:
java.version and java.vm.version are 2 different pieces of info:
java -XshowSettings:properties  2>&1| grep 'java.*version'
    java.class.version = 52.0
    java.runtime.version = 1.8.0_251-b08
    java.specification.version = 1.8
    java.version = 1.8.0_251
    java.vm.specification.version = 1.8
    java.vm.version = 25.251-b08-jvmci-20.2-b01

People may already be depending on the current output format and semantics. This is API and evolving it should be done carefully.

You are right. I only checked with java 11.
Changing this to a draft PR for the time being.
Thanks @dougxc
